Author: jhancock
Content: Good rational.  Not so much a vote for secrecy in a strict form, but rather a vote for less formal transparency in order make progress with less distraction.

Title: Video: 6 years of ejabberd code in 3 minutes

Author: jhancock
Content: I'm not sure you can legislate "unrestrained power".  You can however make it "painfully illegal" to input any form of money into the politic process.  You have a choice to start at either end of the problem.  I think the only viable solution is where Lessig is heading: remove all the money from the process.  Not easy, but achievable.  Going at it from the "power end"??  I have no idea how to start with that considering the U.S. Constitution already provides the best known 3-way power infrastructure.
